import { memo } from "react"; import styles from "./Menu.module.css"; import clsx from "clsx"; import { FaHome, FaShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fa"; function Cart({ onShowCart, listProduct }) { console.log(listProduct); return (

   Your Cart ({listProduct.length})

DINE IN

{listProduct.map((product) => (

1. {product.name}

-

{listProduct.currentQuantity}

+

Kr 123,00

(Incl. tax 10% = Kr 12,30)

))}

Total:

Kr 332,10

(Incl. tax 10% = Kr 12,30)

PAYMENT
); } export default memo(Cart);
